Title: Relates to members of a mobile crisis team
Summary: Provides that members of a mobile crisis team shall include any combination of behavioral health professionals, certified peer specialists, certified recovery peer advocates, credentialed family peer advocates, and credentialed youth peer advocates.
LawCode: Amd ยง36.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to members of a mobile crisis team
